DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether RPC1063 is effective in the treatment of relapsing multiple sclerosis (RMS).
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of RPC1063 in Relapsing Multiple Sclerosis (Radiance Study)
DOC.criteria: Multiple sclerosis as diagnosed by the revised 2010 McDonald criteria EDSS score between 0 and 5.0 at baseline Primary progressive multiple sclerosis
